question: The Reserve Bank of India has extended the Rs 15000 Crore refinance facility that was granted earlier, to which All-India Financial institution?
explanation:
The Reserve Bank of India Governor Shaktikanta Das recently announced that the central bank has decided to roll over (extend) the Rs 15000 Crore refinance facility provided to SIDBI (Small Industries Development Bank of India).
The roll over is to be provided for 90 more days, from the at the end of the 90th day. RBI also announced to extend a line of credit of Rs 15,000 crore to the EXIM Bank for a period of 90 days from the date of availing, with rollover up to a maximum period of one year. EXIM Bank will use this to avail US dollar swap facility for its forex requirement.
